option.name: SCRIPT_TEXT
option.value:
changed_files=$( (git diff --name-only --diff-filter=ACMRTUB origin/main-airflow-2...HEAD; git ls-files --modified --exclude-standard) | grep '\.py$' | sort -u | paste -sd' ' -); docker run --rm -t -v .:/tmp/code_checking --entrypoint "/bin/bash" --workdir "/tmp/code_checking" --pull always dev.docker.adsrvr.org/dataproc/ttd-airflow:prod-latest -c "echo Files: $changed_files; echo -e '
Formatting...'; yapf --in-place --print-modified --recursive --parallel --verbose --style=code_tool_config/.style.yapf $changed_files; echo -e '
Type checking...'; mypy --config-file=code_tool_config/.mypy.ini $changed_files; echo -e '
Linting...'; flake8 --append-config=code_tool_config/.flake8 $changed_files"
